FuncDef: This command configures PTP over Ethernet on the physical port. The PTP process shall transmit and receive PTP messages through the port using Ethernet encapsulation (as opposed to UDP/IPv4 encapsulation).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a specific physical port. Values-slot/mda/port.

Creates the PTP port. This keyword is required when first creating the PTP port, if the system is configured to require it (enabled in the environment create command). Once the PTP port is created, it is possible to navigate into the context without the create keyword.
